channel.title: Deng L. on Giacomo Cordoni
channel.description: Recent content in Deng L. on Giacomo Cordoni

item.title: Hubble Space Telescope survey of Magellanic Cloud star clusters. Photometry and astrometry of 113 clusters and early results
item.description: Homogeneous HST photometry and astrometry of 113 clusters revels unexpcted results in the context of young star clusters in the Magellanic Clouds

item.title: Extended Main-sequence Turnoffs in the Double Cluster h and χ Persei: The Complex Role of Stellar Rotation
item.description: By comparing the observations with simulated CMDs, we find that a simple population composed of coeval stars that span a wide range of rotation rates is unable to reproduce the color spread of the cluster’s MSs. We suggest that variable stars, binary interactions, and stellar rotation affect the eMSTO morphology of these very young.
